entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
